Start writing tests...

Seriously, th=
ere are several approaches to testing code that is already 
written.  One p=
opular approach is to start by writing a test that exposes a 
known bug the=
n fix your code to make the test pass.

You could Google for "test legacy c=
ode".  One of the hits I got there was a 
good page on Ward's WIKI at http:=
//c2.com/cgi/wiki?UnitTestingLegacyCode.
